attributes.review: This app kidnapped my dog, left him in the car without the windows down or air conditioning on, he also did not have water and his favorite music was not playing. Not very cash money of this app if I do say so myself. Btw shoutout MAryland. Also this app did wcw so it’s clearly immature af.
attributes.title: Baguette in my bum

attributes.review: This app quality his horrendous. Like seriously how am supposed to support the most hated president if I can’t log in! Like do y’all want a lawsuit! This is completely illegal!!! Like your infringing on my right to suppose who I want. Screw you trump and you administration.
attributes.title: Would love to give 0 stars

attributes.review: I’ve always been supporting of Trump but this is just ridiculous. TikTok is a platform where we can all share our support to trump and inform people about the good things he does. I’m more than disappointed with this decision.
attributes.title: Disappointed.

attributes.review: This app makes my phone crash every time I open it. It’s extremely glitchy and runs horribly. The information on this app is terribly set up and I’m pretty sure my phone is being hacked when I use this app.
attributes.title: Absolutley Terrible

attributes.review: I don’t understand how people vote for such a terrible person. black lives will always matter. LGBT lives will always matter, and you will never take that away. You can try,but we will always fight back.
attributes.title: white supremacist

attributes.review: i go to open the app and i see this cheeto lookin person on it my poor little sister started crying and she’s had nightmares ever since. on top of that i don’t know why it has this phrase “make america great again” maybe you meant to say “genz is powerful” it ok to make mistakes anyway i don’t recommend this app it should be removed immediately for the safety of the younger children as a member of genz im trying to save people from seeing this ugly cheeto dust looking person anymore it’s absolutely horrifying
attributes.title: no ❤️

attributes.review: i came to download this app so i could support our cheeto 😻but it took wayyyy too long to download...almost two weeks to be exact 😡once i opened the app, it kept lagging and i noticed “trump 2020” all over my phone screen...which in fact offended my grandma 😤 “trump 2020” started moving to different devices in my household and nearly gave my grandmother a heart attack. this app was the worst app i’ve ever downloaded. you best be deleting this app, so other grandmothers don’t have heart attacks 🤬🤬🤬
attributes.title: bruhhhh

attributes.review: I genuinely wanted this app to be good and am in no way supporting or involved in the movement to get it removed. Unfortunately the moment I opened the app a smell so foul and disgusting started emitting from my phone that I had to leave this review... wouldn’t want anyone else to be poisoned by the app!!!!! 🥰
attributes.title: Wishful Thinking

attributes.review: I downloaded the app in hopes of seeing pictures of the orange in its full glory I was very disappointed when I came to see there were rats and spiders coming out of my phone and with lots of ugly photographs of some Cheeto looking dude now I’m constipated and currently at the toilet throwing up 🥰❤️

Off the start app requested my phone number which invaded my privacy, willingly giving my number isn’t something I do. If I wanted to read news on orange guy I would do it else wear without needing to share my personal info.
attributes.title: Not impressed  👎
